row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANSIBLE.PRV.JOB.EXEC_ANSIBLE_CMD@UNIX
row.description: Unix JOBS Object to execute Ansible command

row.process:
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Ansible Command" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_ANSIBLE_EXEC_CMD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** Ansible Command has been executed succesfully ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** Ansible Command execution has been failed ********"
:SET &AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) cd &AGENT_TEMP_DIR#
&UC4RB_ANSIBLE_EXEC_CMD#
execcode=$?
if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi
